section.section:
The Board shall place a licensee on inactive status, if the licensee submits to the Board:
An application for inactive status on the form required by the Board; and
The inactive status fee set by the Board.

The Board shall issue a license to an individual who is on inactive status if the individual:
Meets any continuing education requirements set by the Board; and
Pays to the Board the reinstatement fee set by the Board.

text.section:
The Board may reinstate the license of an optometrist whose license has been expired for less than 5 years and who has not been put on inactive status, if the optometrist:
Has met the continuing education requirements set by the Board;
Meets the renewal requirements of § 11-308 of this subtitle; and
Pays to the Board the reinstatement fee set by the Board.

The Board may not reinstate the license of an optometrist whose license has been expired for 5 years or more and who has not been put on inactive status, unless the optometrist:
Passes an examination administered by the Board; and
Otherwise meets the requirements of subsection (b) of this section.
